record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - July 22, 2008)

[Page: S7078]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Armed Services be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, July 22, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON ENVIRONMENT AND PUBLIC WORKS
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Environment and Public Works be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, July 22, 2008 at 10 a.m. in room 406 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building to hold a hearing entitled, "An Update on the Science of Global Warming and its Implications."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Finance be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, July 22, 2008, at 10 a.m., in room 215 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON HOMELAND SECURITY AND GOVERNMENTAL AFFAIRS
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, July 22, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.to conduct a hearing entitled "Energy Security: An American Imperative."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Select Committee on Intelligence be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on July 22, 2008, at 2:30 p.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: SUBCOMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT OF GOVERNMENT MANAGEMENT, THE FEDERAL WORKFORCE, AND THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs' Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, July 22, 2008, at 2:00 p.m. to conduct a hearing entitled, "Improving Performance: A Review of Pay-for-Performance Systems in the Federal Government."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
